data.why:
A set of modules enabling developers to interact with Microsoft
    Exchange Server 2000 and 2003 using webDAV. Functionality is similar
    to MS Outlook and OWA. current capabilities include: sending MIME
    email using Exchange (no SMTP), create/edit meetings with invites,
    create/edit task list items, create/edit contacts, retrieve calendar
    data. All this is then viewable from Outlook,Evolution,OWA,
    ...whatever can access the data store on Exchange. These were
    written and tested on RedHat 9 using Perl 5.8.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (JERBROO; Jeremy D. Brooks)
